description: Learn how to make porchetta, a boneless pork roast, with this easy recipe. It's served with golden garlic potatoes and perfect for a Sunday roast.
name: Porchetta With Garlic Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using tongs, carefully squeeze garlic over potato and stir gently to combine. Bake pork and potato for a further 1 hour or until pork is very tender and potato is golden. Season. Top pork with remaining rosemary sprig. Serve pork and garlic potatoes with spinach.
